name: Lambella
description:
In this fashion design competition game, you'll play as one of the designer's employees, helping to take care of her sheep by moving them between her living room and gym to ensure they are healthy for the fashion display. You have 30 seconds to complete the task, and you must avoid letting the sheep get too fat or too thin, or you'll lose the competition.

Winning the game requires strategy and skill, and it's perfect for fashion, animal, and strategy game enthusiasts. Impress your boss by successfully completing the task and proving that you have what it takes to work for a renowned fashion designer. Good luck and have fun!
